page.title: 16Law & Order In Mayfield.
page.content: Mayfield has a local,rural policeman of its own called,by coincidence,P.C. Mayfield.He lives in the Police House which has an office attached.P.C. Mayfield works from his office although he is responsible to the Police Station at Crowborough.His working day is officially 8 hours_40 hour week_but as he lives in the Police House he is often unofficially on duty for much longer.P.C.Mayfield 'covers' about 10,000 acres when on duty & is often out working in neighbouring villages such as Wadhurst & Five Ashes.He has a car,a Talbot Sunbeam,which he shares with the Five Ashes P.C.,& sometimes uses a motor bike or Land_Rover.He also does a daily foot patrol in a different area each day.The police office is small & has no computer or special equipment except for the Early Warning System.
